notification_proxy(8) System Manager's Manual notification_proxy(8)

NAME

notification_proxy —
notification server

SYNOPSIS

notification_proxy

DESCRIPTION

notification_proxy enables a trusted remote Mac to read/write notifications on this Mac. Trust requires that this Mac explicitly pair with the remote Mac. The daemon is started automatically by launchd upon the trusted Mac requesting a connection to this service.

This daemon also allows an untrusted remote Mac to read/write notifications while this Mac is still in setup. Once this Mac exits device setup, trust is required.

This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

SEE ALSO

notify(3).
March 25, 2021 Mac OS X
